actions.text: Placed on calendar in Senate under Subjects on the Table.

official_title: A resolution requiring "Big Shots" to stand in line, too.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the Senate that no Member of the Congress, no Member of the Cabinet or head of any Government Agency, no person of the rank of Under Secretary or Assistant Secretary in an Executive Department, no member of the White House staff or Executive Office of the President, and no official of the rank of Vice President, or above, of Exxon, Gulf, Citgo, American, Sunoco, Texaco, or Shell oil companies shall for a period of one hundred eighty days use any form of private or governmental automotive transportation (except public bus or taxi services) unless such official shall have affirmed in writing that the fuel for such vehicle use in transit to and from his regular place of business was acquired personally at the stated price from a service station or other facility which makes fuel available to the general public.

titles.title: A resolution requiring "Big Shots" to stand in line, too.
